detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Fully lined tankini top with padded cups, a fake wrapover with draping at the top and a racer back. Concealed elastication under the bust and four narrow shoulder straps that are braided at the back.
Tunic in jacquard-weave satin with an opening at the front and seam under the bust with a drawstring. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a metal button. Lined.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature and a V-neck at the back with ties at the back of the neck. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature and a V-neck at the back with ties at the back of the neck. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidered text, dropped shoulders and striped ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and a concealed plastic ring at the front. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and a concealed plastic ring at the front. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and a draped front with a plastic ring at one side.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and a draped front with a plastic ring at one side.
Hair elastics decorated with pompoms.
Hair elastics decorated with pompoms.
Short cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Wide V-neck jumper knitted in a wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut top in a softly draping weave with a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves in a double layer of flounces.
Straight-cut top in a softly draping weave with a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves in a double layer of flounces.
Straight-cut top in a softly draping weave with a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves in a double layer of flounces.

Set with a cotton jersey T-shirt, shorts and sun hat. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a small embroidered detail on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Sun hat with narrow ties and a jersey lining.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature, long sleeves and a drawstring at the hem of the top layer. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature, long sleeves and a drawstring at the hem of the top layer. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Blouse in woven fabric with embroidery, inset lace details and pin-tucks at the front. Small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.

Padded bras in soft cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Padded bras in soft cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
